H0.text: Who designed the Volkswagen Beetle. Henry Ford

H1.text: Who designed the Volkswagen Beetle. Ettore Bugatti

H2.text: Who designed the Volkswagen Beetle. Enzo Ferrari

H3.text: Who designed the Volkswagen Beetle. Ferdinand Porsche

A4.text: He is best known for creating the Volkswagen Beetle.

A5.text: Porsche received a contract from Hitler to design a people's car (Volkswagen) in June 1934.
